foreignData.name: Ritter der Ebenholzlegion
foreignData.text:
{2}{B}: Der Ritter der Ebenholzlegion erhält +3/+3 und Todesberührung bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Zu Beginn deines Endsegments und falls ein Spieler in diesem Zug 4 oder mehr Lebenspunkte verloren hat, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf den Ritter der Ebenholzlegion. (Schaden verursacht den Verlust von Lebenspunkten.)

foreignData.name: Caballero de la Legión de Ébano
foreignData.text:
{2}{B}: El Caballero de la Legión de Ébano obtiene +3/+3 y gana la habilidad de toque mortal hasta el final del turno.
Al comienzo de tu paso final, si un jugador perdió 4 o más vidas este turno, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre el Caballero de la Legión de Ébano. (El daño causa pérdida de vidas.)

foreignData.name: Chevalier de la légion d'ébène
foreignData.text:
{2}{B} : Le Chevalier de la légion d'ébène gagne +3/+3 et acquiert le contact mortel jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Au début de votre étape de fin, si un joueur a perdu au moins 4 points de vie ce tour-ci, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur le Chevalier de la légion d'ébène. (Les blessures provoquent la perte de points de vie.)

foreignData.name: Cavaliere della Legione d'Ebano
foreignData.text:
{2}{B}: Il Cavaliere della Legione d'Ebano prende +3/+3 e ha tocco letale fino alla fine del turno.
All'inizio della tua sottofase finale, se un giocatore ha perso 4 o più punti vita in questo turno, metti un segnalino +1/+1 sul Cavaliere della Legione d'Ebano. (Il danno provoca la perdita di punti vita.)

foreignData.name: 漆黒軍の騎士
foreignData.text:
{2}{B}：ターン終了時まで、漆黒軍の騎士は＋３/＋３の修整を受け接死を得る。
あなたの終了ステップの開始時に、プレイヤーがこのターンにライフを４点以上失っていた場合、漆黒軍の騎士の上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。（ダメージによりライフは失われる。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼・騎士

foreignData.name: 검은 군단의 기사
foreignData.text:
{2}{B}: 검은 군단의 기사는 턴종료까지 +3/+3을 받고 치명타를 얻는다.
당신의 종료단 시작에, 플레이어가 이번 턴에 생명점을 4점 이상 잃었다면, 검은 군단의 기사에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다. (피해는 생명점을 잃게 한다.)

foreignData.name: Cavaleiro da Legião de Ébano
foreignData.text:

No início de sua etapa final, se um jogador perdeu 4 ou mais pontos de vida neste turno, coloque um marcador +1/+1 em Cavaleiro da Legião de Ébano. (O dano causa perda de pontos de vida.)

foreignData.name: Рыцарь Эбенового Легиона

В начале вашего заключительного шага, если любой игрок потерял 4 или больше жизней в этом ходу, положите один жетон +1/+1 на Рыцаря Эбенового Легиона. (Повреждения вызывают потерю жизней.)

foreignData.name: 黑檀军团骑士

mainBoard.name: Knight of the Ebon Legion
mainBoard.originalText:
{2}{B}: Knight of the Ebon Legion gets +3/+3 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if a player lost 4 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Knight of the Ebon Legion. (Damage causes loss of life.)

rulings.text: A player doesn’t need to have lost 4 life all at once. If a player loses 2 life twice during a turn, that player lost 4 life during that turn, and Knight of the Ebon Legion receives a +1/+1 counter.
A player loses life if they pay life.
It doesn’t matter whether a player has 4 or less life than they started the turn with. If a player lost 4 life but also gained 6 life, that player still lost 4 life.

Knight of the Ebon Legion looks at your entire turn to determine whether a player lost 4 or more life. It doesn’t matter how many players lost 4 or more life, only whether anyone did. It also doesn’t matter whether Knight of the Ebon Legion was on the battlefield when they lost life.

mainBoard.name: Bloodthirsty Aerialist
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodthirsty Aerialist.

rulings.text: Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, Bloodthirsty Aerialist’s ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
If Bloodthirsty Aerialist is dealt lethal damage at the same time that you gain life, it won’t receive a counter from its ability in time to save it.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won’t cause the ability to trigger, even though it caused your team’s life total to increase.

The ability of Bloodthirsty Aerialist triggers just once for each life-gaining event, whether it’s 1 life from Impassioned Orator or 4 life from Dawning Angel. If you gain an amount of life “for each” of something or “equal to the number” of something, that life is gained as one event and the ability of Bloodthirsty Aerialist triggers only once.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodthirsty Aerialist.

mainBoard.name: Savage Gorger
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Savage Gorger. (Damage causes loss of life.)

rulings.text: A player loses life if they pay life.
It doesn’t matter whether an opponent has less life than they started the turn with. If a player lost 4 life but also gained 6 life, that player still lost 4 life.

Savage Gorger looks at your entire turn to determine whether an opponent lost any life. It doesn’t matter how many opponents lost life or how much life they lost, only whether any of them did. It also doesn’t matter whether Savage Gorger was on the battlefield when they lost life.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.name: Vindictive Vampire
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever another creature you control dies, Vindictive Vampire deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: If Vindictive Vampire dies at the same time as one or more other creatures you control, Vindictive Vampire’s ability triggers for each of those other creatures.
If your life total is brought to 0 or less at the same time that creatures you control are dealt lethal damage, you lose the game before Vindictive Vampire’s triggered ability goes on the stack.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Vindictive Vampire’s ability causes the opposing team to lose 2 life and you gain 1 life.

Opfere eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Convertiré tus huesos en un arma capaz de derribar incluso a los más poderosos".
—Modriss del pantano Zargoth
foreignData.name: Astillas óseas
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, sacrifica una criatura.
Destruye la criatura objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Vos os me serviront à créer une arme qui terrassera même les puissants. »
—Modriss de la maremme de Zargoth
foreignData.name: Fragments d'os
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, sacrifiez une créature.
Détruisez la créature ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Trasformerò le tue ossa in un'arma che abbatterà anche i più potenti."
—Modriss della palude di Zargoth
foreignData.name: Schegge d'Osso
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, sacrifica una creatura.
Distruggi una creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText:
「お前の骨も武器にするとしよう。並外れた者でさえも仕留める武器だ。」
――ザルゴス湿原のモドリス
foreignData.name: 骨の粉砕
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。
クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText:
"나는 네 뼈로 저 강대한 자들마저도 쓰러뜨릴 수 있는 무기를 만들 것이다."
—자르고스 늪지의 모드리스
foreignData.name: 쪼개진 뼈 가시
foreignData.text:
이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 생물 한 개를 희생한다.
생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Farei de seus ossos uma arma que derrubará até mesmo os poderosos."
— Modriss do Charco de Zargoth
foreignData.name: Estacas Ósseas
foreignData.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, sacrifique uma criatura.
Destrua a criatura alvo.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Из твоих костей я сделаю оружие, которое свалит с ног даже самого могучего врага».
— Модрисс с болота Заргот
foreignData.name: Костные Осколки
foreignData.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания этого заклинания пожертвуйте существо.
Уничтожьте целевое существо.

foreignData.flavorText:
「我会将你的骨头化作击倒强敌的武器。」
～札戈斯沼的墨垂兹
foreignData.name: 碎骨贯身
foreignData.text:
牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
消灭目标生物。

foreignData.flavorText:
「我會將你的骨頭化作擊倒強敵的武器。」
～札戈斯沼的墨垂茲
foreignData.name: 碎骨貫身
foreignData.text:
犧牲一個生物，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。
消滅目標生物。

mainBoard.name: Bone Splinters
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.

rulings.text: Once you begin to cast Bone Splinters, no player may take actions until you’re done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the creature you wish to sacrifice.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you can’t cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you can’t sacrifice additional creatures.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Your death will take a mere moment, but it will feel like an eternity."
—Vilis, Broker of Blood

foreignData.flavorText:
„Dein Todeskampf wird nur einen Augenblick dauern, aber es wird sich wie eine Ewigkeit anfühlen."
—Vilis, Makler des Blutes
foreignData.name: Schmerzvolles Absaugen
foreignData.text: Das Schmerzvolle Absaugen fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu und du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Tu muerte será apenas un momento, pero te parecerá una eternidad".
—Vilis, especulador de sangre
foreignData.name: Extracción agonizante
foreignData.text: La Extracción agonizante hace 3 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo y tú ganas 3 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Votre mort ne durera qu'un court instant, mais il vous semblera une éternité. »
—Vilis, courtier de sang
foreignData.name: Siphon d'agonie
foreignData.text: Le Siphon d'agonie inflige 3 blessures à n'importe quelle cible et vous gagnez 3 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText:
"La tua morte non durerà che un istante, ma sembrerà un'eternità."
—Vilis, Intermediario di Sangue
foreignData.name: Assorbimento Straziante
foreignData.text: L'Assorbimento Straziante infligge 3 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio e tu guadagni 3 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText:
「お前の死はほんの一瞬だが、永遠の時間に感じることだろう。」
――血の取引者、ヴィリス
foreignData.name: 苦しめる吸引
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。苦しめる吸引はそれに３点のダメージを与え、あなたは３点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText:
"네 죽음은 한 순간일 뿐이지만, 영원처럼 느껴질 것이다."
—피 중개인, 빌리스
foreignData.name: 고통스러운 흡수
foreignData.text: 원하는 목표를 정한다. 고통스러운 흡수는 그 목표에게 피해 3점을 입히고 당신은 생명 3점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Sua morte vai levar só um instante, mas vai parecer uma eternidade."
— Vilis, Negociante de Sangue
foreignData.name: Sifão Agonizante
foreignData.text: Sifão Agonizante causa 3 pontos de dano a qualquer alvo e você ganha 3 pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Твоя смерть займет лишь мгновение, но тебе оно покажется вечностью».
— Вилис, Кровавый Негоциант
foreignData.name: Мучительное Иссушение
foreignData.text: Мучительное Иссушение наносит 3 повреждения любой цели, а вы получаете 3 жизни.

foreignData.flavorText:
「虽然夺命实际只需一瞬间，但之前的苦痛会让你觉得要一辈子。」
～鲜血掮客维利司
foreignData.name: 苦痛吸魂
foreignData.text: 苦痛吸魂对任意一个目标造成3点伤害，且你获得3点生命。

foreignData.flavorText:
「雖然奪命實際只需一瞬間，但之前的苦痛會讓你覺得要一輩子。」
～鮮血掮客維利司
foreignData.name: 苦痛吸魂
foreignData.text: 苦痛吸魂對任意一個目標造成3點傷害，且你獲得3點生命。

mainBoard.name: Agonizing Syphon
mainBoard.originalText: Agonizing Syphon deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

rulings.text: If the chosen target becomes an illegal target for Agonizing Syphon, the spell won’t resolve. You won’t gain life.

mainBoard.text: Agonizing Syphon deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Variety is also the spice of death."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

foreignData.flavorText:
„Die Würze des Todes liegt in der Vielfalt."
—Cevraya, Golgari-Schamane
foreignData.name: Morbide Menagerie
foreignData.text: Bestimme eine Kreaturenkarte mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 1 in deinem Friedhof. Mache dann dasselbe mit Kreaturenkarten mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 2 und 3. Bringe die bestimmten Karten ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.flavorText:
"La variedad también es la sal de la muerte".
—Cevraya, chamán golgari
foreignData.name: Criadero macabro
foreignData.text: Elige una carta de criatura con coste de maná convertido de 1 en tu cementerio. Luego, haz lo mismo con cartas de criatura con coste de maná convertido de 2 y 3. Regresa esas cartas al campo de batalla.

foreignData.flavorText:
« La diversité donne du piment à la mort. »
—Cevraya, shamane de Golgari
foreignData.name: Horrible ménagerie
foreignData.text: Choisissez une carte de créature avec un coût converti de mana de 1 dans votre cimetière, puis faites de même avec les cartes de créature avec un coût converti de mana de 2 et 3. Renvoyez ces cartes sur le champ de bataille.

foreignData.flavorText:
"La varietà è anche il sale della morte."
—Cevraya, sciamana Golgari
foreignData.name: Serraglio Raccapricciante
foreignData.text: Scegli una carta creatura con costo di mana convertito pari a 1 nel tuo cimitero, poi fai lo stesso per carte creatura con costo di mana convertito pari a 2 e a 3. Rimetti quelle carte sul campo di battaglia.

foreignData.flavorText:
「多様性も死の趣さ。」
――ゴルガリのシャーマン、セヴリヤ
foreignData.name: 陰惨な生類
foreignData.text: あなたの墓地から点数で見たマナ・コストが１であるクリーチャー・カード１枚を選び、その後、点数で見たマナ・コストが２と３であるクリーチャー・カードについても同じことを行う。それらのカードを戦場に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText:
"다양성 또한 죽음의 묘미라네."
—골가리 주술사, 세브라야
foreignData.name: 소름끼치는 야생동물
foreignData.text: 당신의 무덤에 있는 전환마나비용이 1인 생물 카드 한 장을 선택한 후, 전환마나비용이 2와 3인 생물 카드에 대해서도 똑같이 한다. 그 카드들을 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"A variedade também é o tempero da morte."
— Cevraya, xamã Golgari
foreignData.name: Zoológico Horripilante
foreignData.text: Escolha em seu cemitério um card de criatura com custo de mana convertido 1. Em seguida, faça o mesmo com cards de criatura com custo de mana convertido 2 e 3. Devolva aqueles cards ao campo de batalha.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Разнообразие — это также изюминка смерти».
— Севрайя, шаманка Голгари
foreignData.name: Жуткий Зверинец
foreignData.text: Выберите на вашем кладбище карту существа с конвертированной мана-стоимостью 1, затем сделайте то же самое для карт существ с конвертированной мана-стоимостью 2 и 3. Верните те карты на поле битвы.

foreignData.flavorText:
「物种多样也为死亡增趣。」
～葛加理祭师习拉雅
foreignData.name: 兽群惧集
foreignData.text: 从你坟墓场中的生物牌中，总法术力费用为1，2，3的生物牌各选择一张。将这些牌移回战场。

foreignData.flavorText:
「物種多樣也為死亡增趣。」
～葛加理祭師習拉雅
foreignData.name: 獸群懼集
foreignData.text: 從你墳墓場中的生物牌中，總魔法力費用為1，2，3的生物牌各選擇一張。將這些牌移回戰場。

mainBoard.name: Gruesome Menagerie
mainBoard.originalText: Choose a creature card with converted mana cost 1 in your graveyard, then do the same for creature cards with converted mana costs 2 and 3. Return those cards to the battlefield.

rulings.text: All of the returned cards enter the battlefield at the same time.

Gruesome Menagerie doesn't target the cards to return. You choose them while it's resolving. No players may take actions between the time you make each choice and the time you return them to the battlefield.
If a card in your graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
If you don't have a creature card in your graveyard with one mana value, you just continue on to the next.

mainBoard.text: Choose a creature card with mana value 1 in your graveyard, then do the same for creature cards with mana value 2 and 3. Return those cards to the battlefield.
